thread.title: Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft

title: Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft
text:
Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft 5:50pm GMT - 01:37 
Japanese cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck submits to regulators a report over last month's $530 million cryptocurrency theft and proposes security measures that it thinks will protect it against a repeat. Silvia Antonioli reports.   
Japanese cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck submits to regulators a report over last month's $530 million cryptocurrency theft and proposes security measures that it thinks will protect it against a repeat. Silvia Antonioli reports.  //reut.rs/2sz9Mkr
